Question: In his May 2006 annual speech, this person announced increasing maternity benefits and state support of prenatal care for women.
Hints: In ****'s view, concessions on one of these questions on the Western side might be met with concessions from Russia on another.
This person opposed any foreign intervention.
The "Strategy 2020" was first presented by this person on the Extended Meeting of the State Council on 8 February 2008.
